sentences.english: So optical radiation is just visible light energy spreading out.
sentences.chinese: 所以光輻射只是可見光釋放出的能量。

sentences.english: Laser dosimetry belongs with the realm of optical radiometry.
sentences.chinese: 激光劑量學歸於光輻射測量學科。

sentences.english: Luminescence caused by absorption of optical radiation.
sentences.chinese: 由於吸收光輻射而發光的現象。

sentences.english: To study and evaluate the effects of optical radiation on biological and photochemical systems (exclusive of vision).
sentences.chinese: 研究及評估相關的光輻射的生物及光化學系統的效應。

sentences.english: But I though exposed by optical radiation is dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 但是我認爲光輻射是危險的。

sentences.english: Optical radiation, but I thought been exposed radiations is dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 光輻射，但是我認爲暴露出來的輻射是有危險的？
